definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :2Ki 9:24 arrow (cf. Ar. h.uz,wah;un, Eth. h.as’u: id., Di:134, and v. Dr on 1Sa 20:36)—abs. [[הַחֵ֫חִי]] 1Sa 20:36, 1Sa 20:37, 1Sa 20:37 + v:1Sa 20:38 Kt (Qr [[הַחִצִּים]]), perh. also v:1Sa 20:21, v:1Sa 20:22 (so LXX We, for MT pl. [[הַחִצִּים]]), 2Ki 9:24; the usual form is [[חֵץ]]; v. infr.
